20110119020044.000|20110119020046.000|CC1|WITH BREAKING NEWS OUT OF       
20110119020046.000|20110119020047.000|CC1|WASHINGTON STATE.               
20110119020047.000|20110119020049.000|CC1|FROM A CITY OF TO CANE, THE FBI 
20110119020049.000|20110119020052.000|CC1|REVEALS TODAY AN ABANDONED      
20110119020052.000|20110119020053.000|CC1|BACKPACK DISCOVERED YESTERDAY   
20110119020053.000|20110119020055.000|CC1|ALONG THE INTENDED ROUTE OF     
20110119020055.000|20110119020057.000|CC1|SPOKANE'S MARTIN LUTHER KING DAY
20110119020057.000|20110119020058.000|CC1|PARADE, THE FBI THINKS TODAY    
20110119020058.000|20110119020101.000|CC1|THAT BACKPACK WAS NOT JUST A    
20110119020101.000|20110119020102.000|CC1|SUSPICIOUS PACKAGE.             
20110119020102.000|20110119020103.000|CC1|IT WAS THE REAL DEAL.           
20110119020103.000|20110119020104.000|CC1|THE FBI SAYING THAT THAT        
20110119020104.000|20110119020107.000|CC1|BACKPACK CONTAINED, QUOTE, A    
20110119020107.000|20110119020109.000|CC1|POTENTIALLY DEADLY DESTRUCTIVE  
20110119020109.000|20110119020110.000|CC1|DEVICE.                         
20110119020110.000|20110119020112.000|CC1|LIKELY CAPE BIBLE OF INFLICTING 
20110119020112.000|20110119020113.000|CC1|MULTIPLE CASUALTIES.            
20110119020113.000|20110119020115.000|CC1|NOW, IMPORTANTLY, THIS DEVICE   
20110119020115.000|20110119020118.000|CC1|DID NOT DETONATE AT THE SPOKANE,
20110119020118.000|20110119020120.000|CC1|WASHINGTON, MLK DAY PARADE.     
20110119020120.000|20110119020121.000|CC1|THE CONVENTION CENTER WORKERS   
20110119020121.000|20110119020124.000|CC1|WHO FOUND THE BACKPACK, THESE   
20110119020124.000|20110119020126.000|CC1|THREE PEOPLE SAW IT AND         
20110119020126.000|20110119020127.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED THAT WIRE STICKING   
20110119020127.000|20110119020129.000|CC1|OUT OF THE UNATTENDED BACKPACK  
20110119020129.000|20110119020130.000|CC1|COULD BE A BAD THING, THOSE     
20110119020130.000|20110119020132.000|CC1|THREE CITY WORKERS SAW THE      
20110119020132.000|20110119020134.000|CC1|BACKPACK, THEY THOUGHT IT WAS   
20110119020134.000|20110119020135.000|CC1|SUSPICIOUS, AND THEY TOLD POLICE
20110119020135.000|20110119020136.000|CC1|ABOUT IT.                       
20110119020136.000|20110119020137.000|CC1|THANK GOD THEY DID.             
20110119020137.000|20110119020139.000|CC1|WHEN THE POLICE SAW WHAT IT WAS,
20110119020139.000|20110119020140.000|CC1|THEY NOTIFIED THE BOMB SQUAD.   
20110119020140.000|20110119020141.000|CC1|THE BOMB SQUAD MOVED IN.        
20110119020141.000|20110119020143.000|CC1|THE PARADE, WHICH WAS DUE TO    
20110119020143.000|20110119020145.000|CC1|PASS RIGHT BY THIS DEVICE, WAS  
20110119020145.000|20110119020147.000|CC1|REROUTED AWAY FROM THE AREA.    
20110119020147.000|20110119020148.000|CC1|SHOPS IN THE AREA WERE          
20110119020148.000|20110119020148.000|CC1|EVACUATED.                      
20110119020148.000|20110119020151.000|CC1|THEN THE BOMB SQUAD SENT IN A   
20110119020151.000|20110119020151.000|CC1|ROBOT.                          
20110119020151.000|20110119020153.000|CC1|AND IN THEIR TERMS THEY         
20110119020153.000|20110119020155.000|CC1|SUCCESSFULLY DISRUPTED THE      
20110119020155.000|20110119020156.000|CC1|DEVICE.                         
20110119020156.000|20110119020157.000|CC1|IN ADDITION TO DESCRIBING THE   
20110119020157.000|20110119020159.000|CC1|DEVICE AS, QUOTE, VERY LETHAL   
20110119020159.000|20110119020200.000|CC1|AND VERY CAPABLE OF INFLICTING  
20110119020200.000|20110119020204.000|CC1|MULTIPLE CASUALTIES, FRANK      
20110119020204.000|20110119020205.000|CC1|HARRELL, THE FBI AGENT IN CHARGE
20110119020205.000|20110119020207.000|CC1|OF THE SPOKANE OFFICE, MADE IT  
20110119020207.000|20110119020209.000|CC1|CLEAR TO THE LOCAL NEWSPAPER IN 
20110119020209.000|20110119020211.000|CC1|SPOKANE JUST HOW SERIOUSLY THE  
20110119020211.000|20110119020212.000|CC1|BUREAU IS TAKING THE THREAT     
20110119020212.000|20110119020213.000|CC1|TELLING THE PAPER, QUOTE,       
20110119020213.000|20110119020215.000|CC1|CLEARLY THE TIMING AND PLACEMENT
20110119020215.000|20110119020216.000|CC1|OF A DEVICE WITH THE MARTIN     
20110119020216.000|20110119020220.000|CC1|LUTHER KING PARADE IS NOT       
20110119020220.000|20110119020220.000|CC1|COINCIDENTAL.                   
20110119020220.000|20110119020222.000|CC1|WE ARE DOING EVERYTHING HUMANLY 
20110119020222.000|20110119020223.000|CC1|POSSIBLE TO VIF THE INDIVIDUALS 
20110119020223.000|20110119020224.000|CC1|OR INDIVIDUAL WHO CONSTRUCTED   
20110119020224.000|20110119020228.000|CC1|AND PLACED THIS DEVICE.         
20110119020228.000|20110119020229.000|CC1|AGAIN, THE FBI AND SPECIAL AGENT
20110119020229.000|20110119020232.000|CC1|IN CHARGE COMMENT TO THE        
20110119020232.000|20110119020234.000|CC1|SPOKESMAN REVIEW.               
20110119020234.000|20110119020237.000|CC1|TO THAT, IN TERMS OF THE FBI,   
20110119020237.000|20110119020239.000|CC1|THE SERIOUSNESS TO WHICH THE FBI
20110119020239.000|20110119020241.000|CC1|IS TREATING THIS, THE FBI       
20110119020241.000|20110119020244.000|CC1|McCAINISM TASK FORCE IS NOW     
20110119020244.000|20110119020245.000|CC1|OFFERING A $20,000 REWARD FOR   
20110119020245.000|20110119020247.000|CC1|INFORMATION ABOUT THIS CASE.    
20110119020247.000|20110119020249.000|CC1|THEY ARE ALSO ASKING MEMBERS OF 
20110119020249.000|20110119020251.000|CC1|THE MUST BE PUBLIC TO COME      
20110119020251.000|20110119020254.000|CC1|FORWARD IF FOR ANY REASON       
20110119020254.000|20110119020255.000|CC1|SOMEONE TOOK PHOTOS WHERE THIS  
20110119020255.000|20110119020259.000|CC1|DEVICE WAS FOUND THERE YESTERDAY
20110119020259.000|20110119020259.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110119020259.000|20110119020302.000|CC1|ABOUT THE SUSPECT OF A TERRORISM
20110119020302.000|20110119020303.000|CC1|TASK FORCE IN THIS CASE, THEY   
20110119020303.000|20110119020305.000|CC1|SAID, QUOTE, I THINK THE LINK TO
20110119020305.000|20110119020307.000|CC1|THE MARTIN LUTHER KING          
20110119020307.000|20110119020309.000|CC1|CELEBRATION AND MARCH IS        
20110119020309.000|20110119020309.000|CC1|INESCAPABLE.                    
20110119020309.000|20110119020310.000|CC1|AT THAT POINT IT FOLLOWS        
20110119020310.000|20110119020312.000|CC1|DIRECTLY IN THE REALM AND FEAR  
20110119020312.000|20110119020314.000|CC1|OF DOMESTIC TERRORISM.          
20110119020314.000|20110119020315.000|CC1|CLEARLY, THERE WAS SOME         
20110119020315.000|20110119020317.000|CC1|POLITICAL OR SOCIAL AGENDA HERE.
20110119020317.000|20110119020319.000|CC1|AGAIN, THOSE WERE THE TERMS FROM
20110119020319.000|20110119020320.000|CC1|THE FBI.                        
20110119020320.000|20110119020321.000|CC1|IT FALLS DIRECTLY IN THE FEAR   
20110119020321.000|20110119020324.000|CC1|AND REALM OF DOMESTIC TERRORISM.
20110119020324.000|20110119020326.000|CC1|SCARY TERMS BEING USED HERE BY  
20110119020326.000|20110119020327.000|CC1|THE FBI TO DESCRIBE WHAT        
20110119020327.000|20110119020328.000|CC1|HAPPENED, WHAT WAS FOUND AND    
20110119020328.000|20110119020331.000|CC1|WHAT THE BOMB SQUAD DISRUPTED.  
20110119020331.000|20110119020334.000|CC1|AGAIN, AT A MARTIN LUTHER KING  
20110119020334.000|20110119020335.000|CC1|JR. PARADE IN SPOKANE,          
20110119020335.000|20110119020336.000|CC1|WASHINGTON.                     
20110119020336.000|20110119020337.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT MAKING NATIONAL     
20110119020337.000|20110119020340.000|CC1|NEWS, BUT IF WHAT HAPPENED IN   
20110119020340.000|20110119020342.000|CC1|SPOKANE IS WHAT THE FBI IS      
20110119020342.000|20110119020343.000|CC1|IMPLYING IT MIGHT BE, TEN DAYS  
20110119020343.000|20110119020345.000|CC1|AFTER THE SHOOTING OF GABRIELLE 
20110119020345.000|20110119020347.000|CC1|GIFFORDS AND 18 OTHERS IN       
20110119020347.000|20110119020348.000|CC1|TUCSON, IF WHAT HAPPENED IN     
20110119020348.000|20110119020350.000|CC1|SPOKANE IS AS BAD AS THE FBI    
20110119020350.000|20110119020353.000|CC1|SAYS IT MAY BE, THIS STORY HAS  
20110119020353.000|20110119020355.000|CC1|ENORMOUS IMPLICATIONS, NOT JUST 
20110119020355.000|20110119020357.000|CC1|FOR SPOKANE BUT FOR THE ENTIRE  
20110119020357.000|20110119020357.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110119020357.000|20110119020400.000|CC1|JOINING US ON THE PHONE IS      
20110119020400.000|20110119020403.000|CC1|THOMAS CLOUSE COVERING THIS     
20110119020403.000|20110119020404.000|CC1|STORY.                          
20110119020404.000|20110119020405.000|CC1|MR. CLOUSE, THANK YOU FOR YOUR  
20110119020405.000|20110119020406.000|CC1|TIME TODAY.                     
20110119020406.000|20110119020407.000|CC1|I APPRECIATE IT.                
20110119020407.000|20110119020408.000|CC1|>> MY PLEASURE.                 
20110119020408.000|20110119020410.000|CC1|>> FROM YOUR REPORTING, HOW     
20110119020410.000|20110119020411.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY IS THE FBI TAKING     
20110119020411.000|20110119020412.000|CC1|THIS?                           
20110119020412.000|20110119020414.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU CAN SO SEE THE     
20110119020414.000|20110119020415.000|CC1|SERIOUSNESS IN HOW THEY REACT.  
20110119020415.000|20110119020417.000|CC1|VERY RARELY DOES THE FBI COME   
20110119020417.000|20110119020418.000|CC1|OUT TO GIVE US SO MUCH          
20110119020418.000|20110119020418.000|CC1|INFORMATION SO FAST.            
20110119020418.000|20110119020421.000|CC1|AND IN THIS CASE THEY HAD       
20110119020421.000|20110119020422.000|CC1|PHOTOS, THEY HAD INFORMATION AND
20110119020422.000|20110119020425.000|CC1|HAD ALL KINDS OF STUFF.         
20110119020425.000|20110119020426.000|CC1|WE DON'T USUALLY GET THIS FROM  
20110119020426.000|20110119020427.000|CC1|THE FBI.                        
20110119020427.000|20110119020429.000|CC1|>> THE FBI'S STATEMENT ABOUT    
20110119020429.000|20110119020431.000|CC1|THIS SAYS THE DEVICE WAS LETHAL,
20110119020431.000|20110119020433.000|CC1|IT HAD THE POTENTIAL TO INFLICT 
20110119020433.000|20110119020434.000|CC1|MULTIPLE CASUALTIES.            
20110119020434.000|20110119020437.000|CC1|HAVE YOU LEARNED ANYTHING MORE  
20110119020437.000|20110119020439.000|CC1|ABOUT WHAT TYPE OF DEVICE WAS IN
20110119020439.000|20110119020440.000|CC1|THIS BACKPACK?                  
20110119020440.000|20110119020442.000|CC1|>> THEY WON'T GO INTO SPECIFICS.
20110119020442.000|20110119020444.000|CC1|SO ALTHOUGH WE DID GET NEW      
20110119020444.000|20110119020445.000|CC1|INFORMATION TODAY FROM A        
20110119020445.000|20110119020447.000|CC1|SECURITY BRIEFING, FROM SOME    
20110119020447.000|20110119020448.000|CC1|SOURCES WHO DIDN'T WANT TO BE   
20110119020448.000|20110119020450.000|CC1|NAMED BUT THEY WERE WILLING TO  
20110119020450.000|20110119020452.000|CC1|GIVE US THE INFORMATION, THAT   
20110119020452.000|20110119020455.000|CC1|THE BOMB DID HAVE A REMOTE      
20110119020455.000|20110119020458.000|CC1|DEVICE TO DETONATE, SUCH AS A   
20110119020458.000|20110119020459.000|CC1|KEYLESS REMOTE FOR A VEHICLE OR 
20110119020459.000|20110119020500.000|CC1|A GARAGE DOOR OPENER.           
20110119020500.000|20110119020502.000|CC1|AND THE BOMB DID HAVE ITS OWN   
20110119020502.000|20110119020503.000|CC1|SHRAPNEL WHICH COULD HAVE CAUSED
20110119020503.000|20110119020505.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT INJURIES TO ANYONE  
20110119020505.000|20110119020506.000|CC1|NEAR THE BLAST.                 
20110119020506.000|20110119020509.000|CC1|>> THAT SOUNDS LIKE A RELATIVELY
20110119020509.000|20110119020510.000|CC1|SOPHISTICATED DEVICE.           
20110119020510.000|20110119020514.000|CC1|THE INDICATIONS AGAIN FROM THE  
20110119020514.000|20110119020517.000|CC1|SOURCES FOR THE BASIS OF YOUR   
20110119020517.000|20110119020518.000|CC1|REPORTING DOES NOT SAY THIS WAS 
20110119020518.000|20110119020520.000|CC1|A PIPE BOMB WITH A FUSE.        
20110119020520.000|20110119020522.000|CC1|THIS WAS A MORE COMPLICATED     
20110119020522.000|20110119020522.000|CC1|DEVICE?                         
20110119020522.000|20110119020522.000|CC1|>> CORRECT.                     
20110119020522.000|20110119020524.000|CC1|THE INVESTIGATORS WERE CONCERNED
20110119020524.000|20110119020525.000|CC1|ABOUT THE PLACEMENT OF THE      
20110119020525.000|20110119020526.000|CC1|BACKPACK WHICH WAS ON A METAL   
20110119020526.000|20110119020528.000|CC1|BENCH WITH A BRICK WALL BEHIND  
20110119020528.000|20110119020530.000|CC1|IT MEANING THAT ANYTHING -- IT  
20110119020530.000|20110119020532.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE DIRECTED THE BLAST   
20110119020532.000|20110119020534.000|CC1|TOWARD THE MARCHERS IN THE      
20110119020534.000|20110119020534.000|CC1|STREET.                         
20110119020534.000|20110119020537.000|CC1|>> IS THERE ANY SENSE OF HOW    
20110119020537.000|20110119020538.000|CC1|LARGE AN EXPLOSION THIS MIGHT   
20110119020538.000|20110119020542.000|CC1|HAVE CAUSED, HOW MANY CASUALTIES
20110119020542.000|20110119020543.000|CC1|IT COULD HAVE BEEN CAPABLE TO   
20110119020543.000|20110119020545.000|CC1|CAUSE IF IT HAD DETONATED AS    
20110119020545.000|20110119020546.000|CC1|DESIGNED TO DO?                 
20110119020546.000|20110119020548.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE GOTTEN CONFLICTING   
20110119020548.000|20110119020549.000|CC1|REPORTS.                        
20110119020549.000|20110119020551.000|CC1|WE HAVE THE WHOLE RANGE FROM A  
20110119020551.000|20110119020553.000|CC1|SMALL DEVICE TO TAKING DOWN A   
20110119020553.000|20110119020554.000|CC1|BUILDING.                       
20110119020554.000|20110119020557.000|CC1|SO WE HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO PLACE
20110119020557.000|20110119020600.000|CC1|HOW BIG A DEVICE THIS WAS, BUT  
20110119020600.000|20110119020601.000|CC1|IT WAS -- IT CAN FIT IN A       
20110119020601.000|20110119020602.000|CC1|BACKPACK.                       
20110119020602.000|20110119020603.000|CC1|THE QUESTION THEN HOW BIG A     
20110119020603.000|20110119020604.000|CC1|BLAST COULD YOU GET, BUT        
20110119020604.000|20110119020607.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY THE FBI IS CONCERNED. 
20110119020607.000|20110119020609.000|CC1|>> ARE ANY LAW ENFORCEMENT      
20110119020609.000|20110119020611.000|CC1|SOURCES GIVING ANY INDICATION OF
20110119020611.000|20110119020614.000|CC1|LEADS ON WHOM MIGHT HAVE PUT THE
20110119020614.000|20110119020615.000|CC1|BACKPACK THERE, WHAT MIGHT HAVE 
20110119020615.000|20110119020616.000|CC1|MOTIVATED THIS IF THEY          
20110119020616.000|20110119020618.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND ANYTHING ABOUT THAT  
20110119020618.000|20110119020620.000|CC1|YET?                            
20110119020620.000|20110119020621.000|CC1|>> WELL, FRANK HERALD TOLD ME   
20110119020621.000|20110119020622.000|CC1|THEY HAVE DONE INTERVIEWS BUT NO
20110119020622.000|20110119020624.000|CC1|SPECIFIC SUSPECT TO SAY AT THIS 
20110119020624.000|20110119020624.000|CC1|POINT.                          
20110119020624.000|20110119020627.000|CC1|THEY DID SAY THAT THERE IS NO   
20110119020627.000|20110119020632.000|CC1|PUBLIC SAFETY THREAT CURRENTLY. 
20110119020632.000|20110119020635.000|CC1|>> I DO RECALL ANOTHER EXPLOSIVE
20110119020635.000|20110119020636.000|CC1|DEVICE IN DOWNTOWN SPOKANE.     
20110119020636.000|20110119020639.000|CC1|AM I RIGHT TO REMEMBER THAT IT  
20110119020639.000|20110119020641.000|CC1|WAS IN SPOKANE WITH AN EXPLOSIVE
20110119020641.000|20110119020642.000|CC1|DEVICE FOUND NEAR A FEDERAL     
20110119020642.000|20110119020643.000|CC1|COURTHOUSE IN THE CITY LAST     
20110119020643.000|20110119020644.000|CC1|YEAR?                           
20110119020644.000|20110119020645.000|CC1|>> YEAH, IN MARCH.              
20110119020645.000|20110119020646.000|CC1|I THINK IT WAS MARCH 23rd A     
20110119020646.000|20110119020647.000|CC1|DEVICE WAS FOUND OUTSIDE THE    
20110119020647.000|20110119020651.000|CC1|FEDERAL COURTHOUSE, WHICH       
20110119020651.000|20110119020651.000|CC1|COINCIDENTALLY IS ACROSS THE    
20110119020651.000|20110119020653.000|CC1|STREET FROM OUR OFFICE.         
20110119020653.000|20110119020655.000|CC1|BUT IN THAT CASE THEY DID NOT   
20110119020655.000|20110119020656.000|CC1|RELEASE THE INFORMATION FOR     
20110119020656.000|20110119020657.000|CC1|SEVERAL DAYS.                   
20110119020657.000|20110119020700.000|CC1|THEY NEVER ISSUED PHOTOGRAPHS OF
20110119020700.000|20110119020700.000|CC1|THE DEVICE.                     
20110119020700.000|20110119020703.000|CC1|THEY DID NOT COME OUT WITH THE  
20110119020703.000|20110119020704.000|CC1|SAME LEVEL OF CONCERN THAT THEY 
20110119020704.000|20110119020707.000|CC1|DID WITH THIS DEVICE.           
20110119020707.000|20110119020708.000|CC1|>> IS THERE ANY INDICATION THAT 
20110119020708.000|20110119020710.000|CC1|YOU HAVE NOW, EITHER POSITIVE OR
20110119020710.000|20110119020711.000|CC1|NEGATIVE INDICATION THAT LAW    
20110119020711.000|20110119020713.000|CC1|ENFORCEMENT SOURCES THINK       
20110119020713.000|20110119020714.000|CC1|THERE'S ANY CONNECTION BETWEEN  
20110119020714.000|20110119020715.000|CC1|WHAT APPEARS TO BE THIS         
20110119020715.000|20110119020717.000|CC1|ATTEMPTED BOMBING AT THE MLK DAY
20110119020717.000|20110119020719.000|CC1|PARADE YESTERDAY AND ANY

20110119022203.000|20110119022204.000|CC1|AMONG THE OTHER SIDE ON THIS

20110119022206.000|20110119022208.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT CHUNK OF THE PUBLIC 
20110119022208.000|20110119022210.000|CC1|WHO WOULD LIKE TO SEE NOT ONLY
